statements: SELECT tower_name, latitude, longitude FROM location_data WHERE tower_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM location_data WHERE equipment_type = 'Antenna' ORDER BY tower_id DESC;
SELECT tower_name, equipment_type FROM location_data WHERE latitude > 40 ORDER BY longitude ASC;
SELECT tower_id, tower_name, equipment_id FROM location_data WHERE equipment_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM location_data WHERE equipment_type LIKE '%Transceiver%' ORDER BY equipment_id;
SELECT * FROM location_data WHERE tower_id = 1;
SELECT tower_name, latitude, longitude FROM location_data WHERE equipment_type = 'Antenna';
SELECT tower_id, tower_name, equipment_type FROM location_data ORDER BY tower_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM location_data WHERE latitude BETWEEN 35.00 AND 40.00 AND longitude BETWEEN -120.00 AND -100.00;
SELECT tower_name, equipment_type FROM location_data WHERE tower_id IN (2, 5, 8);
SELECT * FROM telecommunication_towers
SELECT tower_name, location FROM telecommunication_towers
SELECT equipment_name, status FROM equipment_data
SELECT tower_id, equipment_count FROM telecommunication_towers WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_id FROM equipment_data ORDER BY status DESC
SELECT tower_id, tower_name, location, equipment_count FROM telecommunication_towers WHERE tower_id = 1;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, status, tower_id FROM equipment_data WHERE status = 'active' ORDER BY equipment_id DESC;
SELECT tower_name, location, equipment_count, tower_id FROM telecommunication_towers WHERE equipment_count > 5 ORDER BY equipment_count ASC;
SELECT tower_name, location, equipment_count, tower_id FROM telecommunication_towers WHERE location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY tower_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM equipment_data JOIN telecommunication_towers ON equipment_data.tower_id = telecommunication_towers.tower_id WHERE status = 'inactive';
SELECT * FROM TelecommunicationTowers;
SELECT tower_name, location_lat, location_lng FROM TelecommunicationTowers;
SELECT tower_id, tower_name, location_lat, location_lng FROM TelecommunicationTowers WHERE tower_id = 1;
SELECT equipment_name FROM Equipment WHERE tower_id = 2;
SELECT log_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_details FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE tower_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM TelecommunicationTowers;
SELECT tower_id, tower_name, location_lat, location_lng FROM TelecommunicationTowers WHERE location_lat > 40;
SELECT t.tower_name, e.equipment_name FROM TelecommunicationTowers t JOIN Equipment e ON t.tower_id = e.tower_id;
SELECT t.tower_name, COUNT(m.log_id) AS maintenance_count FROM TelecommunicationTowers t LEFT JOIN MaintenanceLogs m ON t.tower_id = m.tower_id GROUP BY t.tower_name;

SELECT t.tower_name, m.maintenance_date, m.maintenance_details FROM TelecommunicationTowers t INNER JOIN MaintenanceLogs m ON t.tower_id = m.tower_id WHERE m.maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Tower;
SELECT equipment_name, tower_id FROM Equipment;
SELECT maintenance_date, description FROM Maintenance WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT tower_name, location_lat, location_long FROM Tower ORDER BY tower_id DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, tower_id FROM Equipment WHERE tower_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM Tower;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM Equipment WHERE tower_id = 1;
SELECT maintenance_id, description FROM Maintenance WHERE equipment_id = 3 ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, location_lat, location_long FROM Equipment JOIN Tower ON Equipment.tower_id = Tower.tower_id WHERE Tower.tower_name = 'Main Tower';
SELECT * FROM Equipment JOIN Maintenance ON Equipment.equipment_id = Maintenance.equipment_id JOIN NetworkOptimization ON Equipment.equipment_id = NetworkOptimization.equipment_id;
SELECT * FROM TelecommunicationTowers;
SELECT tower_name, location_lat, location_long FROM TelecommunicationTowers ORDER BY location_lat DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type FROM Equipment WHERE tower_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT technician_name, technician_role FROM Technicians WHERE technician_role = 'Engineer';
SELECT * FROM TelecommunicationTowers;
SELECT tower_name, location_lat, location_long FROM TelecommunicationTowers WHERE tower_id = 1;
SELECT tower_name, equipment_name, equipment_type FROM TelecommunicationTowers JOIN Equipment ON TelecommunicationTowers.tower_id = Equipment.tower_id WHERE equipment_type = 'Antenna';
SELECT * FROM Equipment WHERE tower_id IN (SELECT tower_id FROM NetworkCoverage WHERE coverage_percentage > 75);
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
